blank_slate.title: Create an API Key
blank_slate.description: You haven't created any API keys yet. Would you like to create one now?

revoke.title: Revoke API Key
revoke.description: Are you sure you want to revoke this API Key? This action cannot be undone.

description.single: Are you sure you want to delete this key?
description.plural: Are you sure you want to delete these keys?

message.title: Your New API Key
message.description: Your API key is below. Please store this somewhere safe.

name.label: Name
name.error: Please provide a descriptive name for your key

scope.label: Scope
scope.error: Please select at least one scope
